fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-You have basic defense
-Roleblock immunity
-Redirect immunity
-Your visits are astral
-Players learn who you are when you use your ability on them
-Appears innocent to TIs
-You canâ€™t be hanged
-Protective abilities used on you are redirected to one of your direct living neighbors
-When a good player dies, a random evil player learns your role, but not your identity
-Your votes count as two secretly

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Get rid of all your attributes
